message: Let's be fair, Bob. A 60/40 split seems reasonable for a quick agreement.
Let's try 55/45, it's more fair to me.
Bob, time is running out, and the money is shrinking. I'll compromise slightly - 58/42.
Come on, 57/43 is a good deal considering the money's losing value.
Bob, we're running out of time!  Let's split the difference of our last offers - 55/45.
